text:
Right now, there is no proper verbosity control in the group_sparse_covariance module, as it relies on the logging module. As a result, the output is too verbose (typically in a IPython notebook as in http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/GaelVaroquaux/nilearn_course/blob/master/rendered_notebooks/2_signal_extraction_for_connectomes.ipynb ).

This code needs to be adapted to the incremental verbosity policy.
title: group_sparse_covariance shouldn't be using logging to do progress report
group_sparse_covariance shouldn't be using logging to do progress report
